author: rjmholt
body: Just tried `kill` on macOS and it's an alias of `Stop-Process`. I thought all the aliases masking native utils were taken out?

comments.author: iSazonov
comments.body:
Removing this would be a breaking change.
See https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell-RFC/pull/129

comments.author: SteveL-MSFT
comments.body: @PowerShell/powershell-committee agrees we should remove this alias as it's an oversight and not intentional for this alias to be there

comments.author: msftbot[bot]
comments.body:
:tada:This issue was addressed in #10098, which has now been successfully released as `v7.0.0-preview.3`.:tada:

Handy links:
* [Release Notes](https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/releases/tag/v7.0.0-preview.3)

title: kill still an alias of Stop-Process on *nix
